short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks focus and break times and blocks distracting sites when you're meant to focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app helps to assist people who have difficulty focusing because they're getting distracted online. Set a blacklist of distracting sites, set starting and ending work times for the blocking to take effect and specify how much focus time earns you a break now and then.
